trekking_trips.title: Annapurna Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Explore the diverse landscapes of the Annapurna region, offering panoramic mountain views and rich cultural experiences.

available_treks.name: Annapurna Base Camp Trek From Pokhara

trekking_trips.title: Langtang Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Discover the serene beauty of the Langtang Valley, nestled close to Kathmandu, featuring lush forests and traditional villages.

trekking_trips.title: Everest Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Embark on a journey to the base of the world's highest peak, experiencing Sherpa culture and breathtaking Himalayan vistas.

available_treks.name: Mount Everest Base Camp Trek - 12 days
Gokyo Valley and Everest Base Camp Trek

trekking_trips.title: Wilderness Region Trekking
trekking_trips.description: Venture into the less-traveled paths of Nepal's wilderness regions, offering solitude and untouched natural beauty.

trekking_trips.title: New Trekking Route
trekking_trips.description: Explore newly opened trekking routes in Nepal, providing fresh adventures and unique cultural encounters.

package_tours.title: Nepal Highlight Tour
package_tours.description: Experience the best of Nepal's cultural and natural wonders in this comprehensive highlight tour.

package_tours.title: Upper Mustang Jeep Tour
package_tours.description: Explore the forbidden kingdom of Upper Mustang by jeep, witnessing unique landscapes and ancient Tibetan culture.

package_tours.title: Everest Honeymoon Tour
package_tours.description: A romantic getaway with stunning views of Mount Everest, perfect for honeymooners seeking adventure and serenity.

package_tours.title: Annapurna Hiking Tour
package_tours.description: Enjoy breathtaking hikes in the Annapurna region, suitable for various fitness levels, offering stunning mountain vistas.

package_tours.title: Nagarkot Tour
package_tours.description: Witness spectacular sunrise and sunset views over the Himalayas from Nagarkot, a popular hill station near Kathmandu.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Buddhist Monuments Tour
package_tours.description: Explore the sacred Buddhist stupas and monasteries of Kathmandu Valley, including Boudhanath and Swayambhunath.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Nagarkot Pokhara Tour 06 days
package_tours.description: A whirlwind tour covering the cultural heart of Kathmandu, Himalayan views from Nagarkot, and the lakeside beauty of Pokhara.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu City Tour
package_tours.description: Discover the ancient temples, palaces, and vibrant streets of Kathmandu city, a UNESCO World Heritage hub.

package_tours.title: Nepal Culture Tour
package_tours.description: Immerse yourself in the rich and diverse cultures of Nepal, visiting historical sites and interacting with local communities.

package_tours.title: Kathmandu Valley Tour
package_tours.description: Embark on a tour of Kathmandu Valley's UNESCO World Heritage sites, including Pashupatinath, Boudhanath, Swayambhunath, and Patan Durbar Square.

package_tours.title: Everest View Tour
package_tours.description: Get magnificent views of Mount Everest and surrounding peaks without extensive trekking, typically involving a short hike or flight.

peak_climbing.title: Mustang, Saribung Peak Climb via Damodar Lake and Phu Valley
peak_climbing.description: An adventurous peak climbing journey through the remote Mustang region, combining Saribung Peak with the cultural richness of Damodar Kunda and Phu Valley.

peak_climbing.title: Mera Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Ascend Mera Peak, Nepal's highest trekking peak, known for its breathtaking vistas of five 8000m giants.

peak_climbing.title: Island Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Climb the popular Island Peak (Imja Tse), a favorite among trekkers seeking their first Himalayan summit in the Everest region.

peak_climbing.title: Lobuche Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Challenge yourself with a climb to Lobuche East Peak, offering panoramic views of the Everest region including Everest, Lhotse, Nuptse, Ama Dablam.

peak_climbing.title: Everest Three Peak Climbing: Mera, Island, Lobuche Peak
peak_climbing.description: An ultimate climbing adventure tackling three iconic trekking peaks in the Everest region: Mera Peak, Island Peak, and Lobuche East.

peak_climbing.title: Chulu East Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Embark on a rewarding climb of Chulu East in the Annapurna region, offering stunning views of the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri ranges.

peak_climbing.title: Tent Peak Climbing (Tharpu Chuli)
peak_climbing.description: Climb Tent Peak (Tharpu Chuli), located in the heart of the Annapurna Sanctuary, offering magnificent close-up views of Annapurna I and its surrounding peaks.

peak_climbing.title: Thorong Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Combine the classic Annapurna Circuit trek with a climb of Thorong Peak, situated near the famous Thorong La Pass.

peak_climbing.title: Yala Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Experience the thrill of climbing Yala Peak in the Langtang region, suitable for beginners seeking Himalayan adventure with great views of Shishapangma.

peak_climbing.title: Amadablam Expedition in Nepal
peak_climbing.description: Climb the beautiful Ama Dablam in the Everest region, known for its challenging routes and stunning views. (Note: Often considered a full expedition rather than just a trekking peak).

peak_climbing.title: Chulu West Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Embark on an adventurous expedition to Chulu West Peak, a more challenging climb in the Annapurna Massif.

peak_climbing.title: Pisang Peak Climbing
peak_climbing.description: Climb the fascinating Pisang Peak in the Annapurna region, offering technical challenges and scenic beauty along the Annapurna Circuit route.

nepal_expeditions.title: Mt Everest Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Embark on the ultimate mountaineering challenge to summit Mt Everest, the world's highest peak.

nepal_expeditions.title: Dhaulagiri Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Challenge yourself with an expedition to Dhaulagiri, the seventh highest mountain in the world.

nepal_expeditions.title: Kanchenjunga Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Attempt to summit Kanchenjunga, the third highest mountain globally, offering a remote and demanding climb.

nepal_expeditions.title: Annapurna Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Take on the formidable Annapurna I, known for its technical difficulty and stunning beauty.

nepal_expeditions.title: Makalu Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Climb Makalu, the fifth highest mountain in the world, featuring impressive technical sections.

nepal_expeditions.title: Manaslu Expedition with Helicopter
nepal_expeditions.description: Ascend Manaslu, the eighth highest peak, with the added convenience of helicopter support for logistics or return.

nepal_expeditions.title: Manaslu Expedition
nepal_expeditions.description: Embark on a classic expedition to summit Manaslu, offering a rewarding climb in a restricted region.

nepal_rafting.title: Bhotekoshi River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Experience the thrill of whitewater rafting on the Bhotekoshi River, known for its challenging rapids.

nepal_rafting.title: Kali Gandaki River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Navigate the Kali Gandaki, one of Nepal’s most adventurous rivers, passing through gorges and remote villages.

nepal_rafting.title: Karnali River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Enjoy a long and exhilarating rafting experience on Nepal’s longest and mightiest river, the Karnali.

nepal_rafting.title: Seti River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: Perfect for beginners and families, the Seti River offers gentle rapids and beautiful scenery.

nepal_rafting.title: Sunkoshi River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: A classic multi-day rafting trip, the Sunkoshi offers both thrilling rapids and serene float sections.

nepal_rafting.title: Trishuli River Rafting
nepal_rafting.description: The most popular rafting river in Nepal, ideal for a short adventure from Kathmandu or Pokhara.

biking_tours.title: Upper Mustang Biking Tour
biking_tours.description: Embark on an adventurous mountain biking journey through the arid landscapes and ancient Tibetan culture of Upper Mustang.

biking_tours.title: Annapurna Circuit Biking Tour
biking_tours.description: Experience the classic Annapurna Circuit on two wheels, cycling through diverse terrains, high passes, and charming villages.

biking_tours.title: Annapurna Circuit with Upper Mustang Biking Tour
biking_tours.description: A grand biking adventure combining the best of the Annapurna Circuit with the unique, restricted region of Upper Mustang.

helicopter_tours.title: Langtang Helicopter Tour
helicopter_tours.description: Enjoy a scenic helicopter flight to the beautiful Langtang Valley, offering close-up views of Langtang Lirung and surrounding peaks.

helicopter_tours.title: Annapurna Helicopter Tour
helicopter_tours.description: A breathtaking helicopter journey to Annapurna Base Camp, flying amidst towering peaks like Annapurna I, Machhapuchhre, and Hiunchuli.

helicopter_tours.title: Everest Base Camp 5364m on Heli flight
helicopter_tours.description: An iconic helicopter flight to Everest Base Camp (5364m) with a landing at Kala Patthar (5545m) for the best views of Mount Everest.
helicopter_tours.duration: Approx 3 - 4 Hours (including ground time & fuel stops)

helicopter_tours.title: Explore Nepal, Annapurna Base Camp Tour in 3 Days
helicopter_tours.description: A short and luxurious tour combining cultural exploration with a helicopter flight to Annapurna Base Camp over 3 days.

helicopter_tours.title: GorakShep to Lukla Helicopter Tour
helicopter_tours.description: A convenient helicopter shuttle from Gorak Shep (near Everest Base Camp) back to Lukla, saving days of trekking.

helicopter_tours.title: Kathmandu to Lukla Helicopter Tour
helicopter_tours.description: Fly directly from Kathmandu to Lukla by helicopter, bypassing the regular flight uncertainties and enjoying scenic views.

helicopter_tours.title: Nepal Himalaya Mountain Flight
helicopter_tours.description: Enjoy a breathtaking flightseeing experience over the Himalayan range. Witness Mount Everest and other 8000m peaks without the need for trekking.

jungle_safari_and_hunting.title: Chitwan Jungle Safari Tour
jungle_safari_and_hunting.description: Explore Nepal’s first national park, Chitwan National Park, home to endangered species like the one-horned rhinoceros and Bengal tiger. Enjoy jeep safaris, canoe rides, bird watching, and Tharu cultural performances.

jungle_safari_and_hunting.title: Blue Sheep Hunting Safari and Adventure
jungle_safari_and_hunting.description: Embark on a challenging hunting safari for Blue Sheep (Bharal) in the high-altitude regions of Nepal, a unique and regulated adventure.

jungle_safari_and_hunting.title: Hunting Himalaya Tahr
jungle_safari_and_hunting.description: A thrilling hunting expedition for the Himalayan Tahr in designated hunting reserves, offering a rugged mountain experience.

jungle_safari_and_hunting.title: Combo Hunting Adventure Safari
jungle_safari_and_hunting.description: A comprehensive hunting package that may include opportunities for multiple species like Blue Sheep and Himalayan Tahr, subject to permits and seasons.

jungle_safari_and_hunting.title: Bardiya Tour Package
jungle_safari_and_hunting.description: Discover the wilderness of Bardiya National Park, known for its tiger population, wild elephants, and diverse wildlife. Includes jeep safari, jungle walks, and cultural experiences.

nepal_paragliding.title: Paragliding in Nepal
nepal_paragliding.description: Fly high above the Himalayas with tandem paragliding in Pokhara, one of the world's top paragliding destinations. Witness stunning aerial views of the Annapurna range and Phewa Lake.

bunzy_jump_in_nepal.title: Bungee Jump in Nepal
bunzy_jump_in_nepal.description: Leap off Nepal's iconic bungee jump bridges above the roaring Bhote Koshi River. This adrenaline-pumping activity is a favorite for thrill-seekers visiting Nepal.
